author: Quick Edit
title: Quick Edit: Migrants feeling deep call of home
description: “You have come here from other states, stay here with us,” Maharashtra CM Uddhav Thakeray has appealed to migrants from UP, Bihar and other states, switching from his usual Marathi address to Hindi to be...
content: You have come here from other states, stay here with us, Maharashtra CM Uddhav Thakeray has appealed to migrants from UP, Bihar and other states, switching from his usual Marathi address to Hindi to be better understood. It is a far cry from the Shiv Sena mes… [+1799 chars]
